query.pigql: q = load "DPS_PRICE_AGGREGATED"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_36) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_39) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_53) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_41) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_40) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_42) }};q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_24) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_20) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_11) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_12) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_13) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day')in {{ selection(Date_of_audit_Year_Date_of_audit_Month_31) }} ; q = group q by 'Channel';q = foreach q generate 'Channel' as 'Channel', sum('SP_Compliant') /sum('Total_Audited') as 'Price_Score';

q = load "DPS_PRICE_AGGREGATED";q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_36) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_39) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_53) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_41) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_40) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_42) }}; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_24) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_20) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_11) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_12) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_13) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day')in {{ selection(Date_of_audit_Year_Date_of_audit_Month_31) }} ; q = group q by 'Region';q = foreach q generate 'Region' as 'Region', sum('SP_Compliant') /sum('Total_Audited') as 'Price_Score';

q = load "DPS_PRICE_AGGREGATED";q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_36) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_39) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_53) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_41) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_40) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_42) }}; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_24) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_20) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_11) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_12) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_13) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day')in {{ selection(Date_of_audit_Year_Date_of_audit_Month_31) }} ; q = group q by 'Customer';q = foreach q generate 'Customer' as 'Customer', sum('SP_Compliant') /sum('Total_Audited') as 'Price_Score';q = order q by 'Price_Score' desc;q = limit q 10;

q = load "DPS_PRICE_RAW";q = filter q by 'Score_Type' == "SP Score"; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_24) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_20) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_11) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_12) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_13) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }}; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 months ago".."2 months ago"]; last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["3 months ago".."3 months ago"]; diff = group cur by 'SKU', last by 'SKU'; diff = foreach diff generate last.SKU as 'SKU',avg(last['Score']) as 'Last Month', avg(cur['Score']) as 'Current Month', avg(cur['Score'])-avg(last['Score']) as 'Percent_Diff';

q = load "DPS_PRICE_RAW";q = filter q by 'Score_Type' == "SP Score"; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_24) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_20) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_11) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_12) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_13) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_19) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_22) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_23) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_25) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }}; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 months ago".."2 months ago"]; last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["3 months ago".."3 months ago"]; diff = group cur by 'SKU', last by 'SKU'; diff = foreach diff generate last.SKU as 'SKU',avg(last['Score']) as 'Last Month', avg(cur['Score']) as 'Current Month', avg(cur['Score'])-avg(last['Score']) as 'Percent_Diff';

parameters.text:
This chart lists all the audited SKUs in the country, the % of enrolled 
stores that they were SP compliant in in the latest month, and the 
variance from the previous month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were SP compliant in the 
enrolled stores across all the Channels in the country in the 
latest month.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Price 
compliant across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were SP compliant in the 
enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country in the latest 
month.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers
 within a country which were Price Compliant in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were SP compliant in enrolled
 stores in different regions of the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Price 
compliant in different regions of the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were SP compliant in MT 
enrolled stores across all the Product categories in the country 
in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Price 
compliant across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were SP compliant in 4P, 5P 
and 6P stores in the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Price 
compliant for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were SP compliant in the 
enrolled stores for the country over a period of last 12 months.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Price 
compliant for the last month.

This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Price
 compliant for the country over a period of last 12 months.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were SP compliant in the 
enrolled stores for a country in the last month.
